LanguageData.RD_ReturnedFromTheDeadGood.stages.0.desc: I died and lived to tell the tale! How cool is that?!
LanguageData.RD_ReturnedFromTheDeadBad.stages.0.label: returned from the dead
LanguageData.RD_ReturnedFromTheDeadBad.stages.0.descr: I died. I actually died. It's all so terrifyingly fragile!
